dct_title_s: An accurate map of the Holy Land divided into the XII tribes of Israel
dct_alternative_sm: An accurate map of the Holy Land divided into the 12 tribes of Israel
An accurate map of the Holy Land divided into the twelve tribes of Israel
dct_description_sm: Coordinates approximate and based on Greenwich meridian.
Bar scale on map given in "English Miles".
Shows topography, drainage, locations of the 12 tribes of Israel within Palestine, boundaries, travel routes, settlements, places of historical interest.
Features a decorative cartouche and compass rose.
Appears in Bowen's A complete system of geography, London, 1747.
